DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect pre-warmed intravenous fluid early outcomes ambulatory patient undergo monitor anesthesia care .
DOC.brief_title: Pre-warmed Intravenous Fluids Monitored Anesthesia Care
DOC.detailed_description: Monitored anesthesia care ( MAC ) increase fast track anesthesia ambulatory outpatient surgery . MAC provide low anesthetic agent general anesthesia , however show result high anesthetic complication rate negligent monitoring . Therefore , aim study investigate effect pre-warmed intravenous fluid core body temperature early outcome .
DOC.criteria: 20years 70years old female patient undergoing urinary incontinence surgery monitor anesthesia care . Preoperative tympanic membrane temperature > 38 < 36 End stage heart failure renal failure Otitis medium
